name: Sophie Chegaray
background: Sophie Chegaray serves as Commissioning Editor, Society and Geopolitics at France Télévisions. Focus areas: Society, geopolitics, current affairs. They are looking for: Geopolitical docs with French perspective; social docs on contemporary French issues; international affairs with French relevance. Overall network strategy: France Télévisions seeks premium documentary and specialist factual content that reflects French culture, society, and perspectives with a strong emphasis on journalistic integrity, creative innovation, and cultural enrichment across its family of channels.
thematic_priorities: social docs on contemporary French issues
premium documentary programming with strong cultural relevance
regional documentary programming celebrating French cultural diversity
target_audience: Broad French audiences across France Télévisions family of channels
budget_parameters: Documentary: €150K–€350K per hour; Specialist Factual: €180K–€400K per hour
technical_requirements: subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Two-page treatment with premise, approach, and narrative structure
Details of secured or potential access
Key talent and production team credentials
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach; emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; encouragement of sustainable production practices.
